HomePage.description: Anchor Point LÃ¼tjendeile is a true paradise for those who want to treat themselves to a romantic getaway. Situated on the shores of the lake, with its own jetty and sauna for relaxing hours for two, this place offers everything your heart desires to forget about everyday life, enjoy the sunset in a private retreat surrounded by breathtaking nature - and let yourself be enchanted by the peace and togetherness. Here you can not only relax, but also rediscover yourself. A place for couples who want to rest together.
